item.title: Spring Boot: Security Hardening
item.description: When working on the Squaddy App I’ve seen a LOT of internet background noise in our logs. It’s especially timely given the recent Log4j2 Remote Code Execution exploit. We’ve done a lot of work to ensure we stay as safe as possible and I wanted to go through some recommendations. What we mean by ‘Safe’? Whenever talking about security we’re really asking “How confident am I this will work as I expect?
